Spend your special day in the North Yorkshire countryside


Whether you want a cosy barn gathering or to tie the knot surrounded by lush green fields, our farm has alot to offer.

We are located in the small village of Gateforth, only 5 miles from the town of Selby, but wonderfully quiet and surrounded by nature.


Get in touch to find out more!

Take a look around

Antique Barn

The perfect cosy venue for smaller weddings.

Main Field

A large field with plenty of space for marquees.

Catering

We offer afternoon-tea and buffet style catering.

Accomodation

We have two cottages on site available for hire.
